docs.title: Welcome to RetRO - Where Ragnarok Begins Again
General
docs.text:
• Episode: 13.1: Ash Vacuum
  • Server Type: Pre-Renewal
  • Max Level: 99/70
  • Max Status Normal/Baby: 99
  • Max ASPD: 193
  • Instant Cast: 150 dex
  • Server Time: UTC
  • Emulator: rAthena
  • International Server
  • Server Language: English

docs.title: Rates
docs.text:
• Exp: 5x
  • Normal Monster Items Drops and Cards: 5x
  • MvP Items Drops: 3x
  • Mini Boss and MvP Card Drops: 1x

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• No Job Changer
  • No Free Healer or Buffer
  • Special System Coin
  • No Sell Cards
  • Daily Rewards System
  • Hunting Missions
  • Quality of Life Improvements
  • MVP Instances
  • Reset stats/skills
  • GRF editing allowed
  • Cosmetic only cash shop

docs.title: Bronze Coin
docs.text: • A basic currency commonly found across the world of RetRO, dropped by most monsters with a 5% chance.

docs.title: Silver Coin
docs.text: • A refined currency awarded through server events and special challenges.

docs.title: Gold Coin
docs.text: • A rare and prestigious currency, dropped by almost every MVP monsters.
